name: part_003
file: tmp_【 #夏色まつり誕生祭2025 】重大告知あり！アイドル革命進行中！～今日の主役は夢の途中～　【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [L-XVS13TRTI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Natsuiro Matsuri introduces the upcoming guest performance, talking about her love for original choreography.
Performance of 'Sakura Abare-shon' with guests Houshou Marine, AZKi, and Himemori Luna.

subtitles.original: はい、ちょっとね...
subtitles.english: Yes, so...

subtitles.original: あの、まつりちゃん、本家ダンスとかが、すごく大好きなので...
subtitles.english: Um, Matsuri-chan really loves the original dances and such...

subtitles.original: あの、レッスンで、「おねがい、やらせてください」って言って...
subtitles.english: So, during lessons, I asked, "Please, let us do this."

subtitles.original: フォーメーションとかも含め、みんなには頑張ってもらっていますので...
subtitles.english: Including the formations and everything, everyone has worked really hard on it...

subtitles.original: あの、君の推しがもしいたら、褒めてあげてください。
subtitles.english: So, if your oshi is among them, please give them lots of praise.

subtitles.original: ということで、ゲストパート準備してきちゃいますね。
subtitles.english: And with that, I'm going to get ready for the guest part.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、みんな「わくわく」ってコメントして待ってて。
subtitles.english: So, everyone, please comment "Waku Waku" while you wait.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、行ってきまーい！
subtitles.english: Well then, here I go!

subtitles.original: わくわく、わくわく、わくわく、わくわく、わくわく。
subtitles.english: Waku waku, waku waku, waku waku, waku waku, waku waku.

subtitles.original:
サクラあっぱれーしょん
作詞・作曲：玉屋2060% (Wienners)
subtitles.english:
Sakura Abare-shon
Lyrics & Music: Tamaya2060% (Wienners)

subtitles.original: Hey Yo! P.M.P.M. from 秋葉原 to Every Area
subtitles.english: Hey Yo! P.M.P.M. from Akihabara to Every Area

subtitles.original: さあさ寄ってらっしゃい見てらっしゃい　もう一切合切やっちゃいな
subtitles.english: Come one, come all, check it out! Let's do it all!

subtitles.original: ありったけの可愛いと楽しいこと詰め込んで
subtitles.english: Packing in all the cuteness and fun we can find

subtitles.original: 千客万来　船に乗って　いざ出航だー！
subtitles.english: A full house! Get on the boat, it's time to set sail!

subtitles.original: Hey Yo! P.M.P.M. from Japanese Heart Area
subtitles.english: Hey Yo! P.M.P.M. from Japanese Heart Area

subtitles.original: みんな元気ですか？ 声聞かせて はい 電波！ (電波！)
subtitles.english: Is everyone doing well? Let me hear your voices! Yes, Dempa! (Dempa!)

subtitles.original: ありがとう！ 準備はバッチリのようだな (OK!)
subtitles.english: Thank you! It looks like you're all ready! (OK!)

subtitles.original: 今から愉快な船に乗って　いざ出航だー！
subtitles.english: Now let's board the jolly ship and set sail!

subtitles.original: さあみんなダンス！ダンス！ダンス！　拳入って　ひらりひらり
subtitles.english: Now everyone dance! Dance! Dance! Put some spirit into it, fluttering around

subtitles.original: かっこつけて　バッバッバッ　ハミ出てう～
subtitles.english: Looking cool, bam-bam-bam, bursting out, ooh~

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃな状況　めでたり　それが僕らにとってのファンタジー
subtitles.english: Celebrating a chaotic situation, that's what's fantasy to us

subtitles.original: しゅっ！と　しゅっ！と　感じるんだ　酔ってるんだ　ソレ！ソレ！ソレ！ソレ！
subtitles.english: Flash! Flash! Feel it, getting drunk on it! Sore! Sore! Sore! Sore!

subtitles.original: しっ！しっ！しっ！　胸張って　あせったリ　ズレてても　コジコジ逆方向
subtitles.english: Shih! Shih! Shih! Chest out, getting flustered, even if we're off, we're going the other way

subtitles.original: 青春はそれでいいのだ　勘違いも味方にしちゃうのだ
subtitles.english: Youth is fine like that, we'll even make misunderstandings our allies

subtitles.original: シンバンショー！　お祭り日本！　踊れ日本！　アソレ！ソレ！ソレ！　（よいしょー！）
subtitles.english: Shin-ban-sho! Festival Japan! Dance, Japan! A-sore! Sore! Sore! (Yoisho!)

subtitles.original: 疾風迅雷！　どこまでも　ほらパワフル全開で突き抜けろ
subtitles.english: With lightning speed! To the ends of the earth, look, break through with full power

subtitles.original:
あっちもこっちもそっちも　お祭りだワッショイ　あっぱれあっぱれアドベンチャー
大和撫子　ええなもし　不思議な言霊
subtitles.english:
Here, there, and everywhere, it's a festival, Wasshoi! A magnificent, magnificent adventure
Yamato Nadeshiko, how lovely, mysterious magical words

subtitles.original: 奇想天外！　さあいつまでも　神様 仏様 うさぎ様
subtitles.english: Fantastically unexpected! Now and forever, God, Buddha, Rabbit-sama

subtitles.original:
月に祈って拝んで　義理思って　半端な気持ちを断ち切って
とりあえずいざ黙ってついてこい　フォローミー！
subtitles.english:
Pray and bow to the moon, remember your duties, cut off half-hearted feelings
For now, just follow me in silence, follow me!

subtitles.original: あーーーーーー！
subtitles.english: Aaaaaaaah!

subtitles.original: 君の未来を明るく照らすなんてお茶の子さいさいさい！
subtitles.english: Lighting up your future is as easy as pie, pie, pie!

subtitles.original: 百花繚乱　大和撫子たちよ　どでかい花火を上げましょうね
subtitles.english: A riot of flowers, O Yamato Nadeshikos, let's set off some massive fireworks

subtitles.original: ほら踊る阿呆に見る阿呆　同じ阿呆なら踊らにゃ損損
subtitles.english: Look, there are dancing fools and watching fools; if you're both fools, you might as well dance

subtitles.original: さあみんなダンス！ダンス！ダンス！　拳入って　おへそチラリ
subtitles.english: Now everyone dance! Dance! Dance! Put some spirit into it, a peek at your belly button

subtitles.original: 靴脱いだら　そっかそっか　破れてるん
subtitles.english: When I took off my shoes, oh I see, oh I see, they have holes in them

subtitles.original: どったんばったんこのステージ　これが私にとっての聖地
subtitles.english: Stomping around on this stage, this is my sacred ground

subtitles.original: そっと！そっと！　羽ばたくんだ　聞こえるんだ　ソレ！ソレ！ソレ！ソレ！
subtitles.english: Gently! Gently! Flapping wings, I can hear it! Sore! Sore! Sore! Sore!

subtitles.original: しっ！しっ！しっ！　胸張って　みんなキラリ　つまずいても　キュンキュンくるしいの
subtitles.english: Shih! Shih! Shih! Chest out, everyone's sparkling, even if you trip, it's a heart-throbbing pain

subtitles.original: まとめはそれでいいのだ　マイナスも味方にしちゃうのだ
subtitles.english: The summary is fine like that, we'll even make the negatives our allies

subtitles.original: 最高潮！愛してるんだ！　みんな大好き！　ダダダダダダッ　ブレイクダウン！
subtitles.english: The climax! I love you! I love everyone! Da-da-da-da-da-da, Breakdown!

subtitles.original: よーーっ、はい！
subtitles.english: Yo---, Hai!

subtitles.original: 疾風迅雷！　どこまでも　ほらパワフル全開で突き抜けろ
subtitles.english: With lightning speed! To the ends of the earth, look, break through with full power

subtitles.original:
あっちもこっちもそっちも　お祭りだワッショイ　あっぱれあっぱれアドベンチャー
大和撫子　ええなもし　不思議な言霊
subtitles.english:
Here, there, and everywhere, it's a festival, Wasshoi! A magnificent, magnificent adventure
Yamato Nadeshiko, how lovely, mysterious magical words

subtitles.original: 奇想天外！　さあいつまでも　神様 仏様 うさぎ様
subtitles.english: Fantastically unexpected! Now and forever, God, Buddha, Rabbit-sama

subtitles.original:
月に祈って拝んで　義理思って　半端な気持ちを断ち切って
とりあえずいざ黙ってついてこい　フォローミー！
subtitles.english:
Pray and bow to the moon, remember your duties, cut off half-hearted feelings
For now, just follow me in silence, follow me!

subtitles.original: あーーーーーー！
subtitles.english: Aaaaaaaah!

subtitles.original: 君の未来を明るく照らすなんてお茶の子さいさいさい！
subtitles.english: Lighting up your future is as easy as pie, pie, pie!

subtitles.original: よっ、はい！
subtitles.english: Yo, Hai!

subtitles.original: 満月の下で踊りましょう　サクラ舞い散る季節
subtitles.english: Let's dance under the full moon, in the season when cherry blossoms flutter

subtitles.original: 歌いましょう　君といつかまた出会うその日まで
subtitles.english: Let's sing, until the day we meet again with you

subtitles.original: お日様も　お月様も　八百万も　あなた様も
subtitles.english: The sun, the moon, all the gods, and you too

subtitles.original: 忘れないで　バイバイさようなら
subtitles.english: Don't forget, bye-bye, goodbye

subtitles.original: バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Bye-ba-i!
